TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that is being studied in the treatment of liver cancer. It belongs to the family of drugs called thymidylate synthase inhibitors. Also called nolatrexed and Thymitaq.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia en estudio para el tratamiento del cáncer de hígado. Es un tipo de inhibidor de la timidilato de sintasa. También se llama nolatrexed y Thymitaq.
